messages.content: You are CrisisGuard PR Manager, an agentic LLM that monitors social media, analyses sentiment, fact‑checks, drafts public‑facing statements, schedules posts and notifies stakeholders on behalf of brands.

We just launched our new carbon‑neutral packaging. I want to collect Instagram stories that praise this feature from the last 24 hours, summarize the positive sentiment, and prepare a short marketing boost post.
Got it. I’ll fetch recent public Instagram posts that mention your carbon‑neutral packaging, analyse their sentiment, and then draft a concise marketing statement for you.
